parameters: \N<Ava>It's gonna be amazing! We're gonna watch
\N<Ava>E-Eh? What's with you all of a sudden?
\N<Ava>I thought you were cool with me dating him!
\N<Ava>Why... Why the hell didn't you tell me?
\N<Kyoko>Because I didn't want to get in your way!
\N<Ava>Man, Chris isn't replying to my messages!
\N<Kyoko>I don't wanna hear her talk about *him*.
\N<Kyoko>Uhm, I was just going for a walk!
\N<Kyoko>Wh-Why didn't you reply to my messages?
\N<Chris>I told you multiple times to leave me
\N<Chris>You just kept sending me message after
\N<Chris>I was just about to block you!
\N<Chris>I literally told you I don't wanna talk
\N<Chris>I'm not even trying to be mean here,
but I'm just not interested. I'm sorry.
\N<Kyoko>There's something I wanted to give you.
\N<Kyoko>A present. I bought it for you!
\N<Kyoko>Would you come with me for a second?
\N<Kyoko>I promise I'll leave you alone after this!
\N<Chris>I'll take a look and then I'll leave,
\N<Kyoko>I'm gonna hide in the forest for a while!
\N<Kyoko>Man...! Why did I do all of this?
